[...] This is the online version of JavaScript for R, a book currently under development and intended for release as part of the R series by CRC Press. The R programming language has seen the integration of many languages; C, C++, Python, to name a few, can be seamlessly embedded into R so one can conveniently call code written in other languages from the R console.
